name: KeepShopkeeping
description:
KeepShopkeeping is a game about learning new recipes and crafting them. In the game you will be able to meet the lovely townies of Keepshopkeeping and battle new monsters. In the end there will be a final boss waiting for you to defeat him. KeepShopkeeping is a hard and very grinding game, so beware in case you don't like these kinds of games! Shop, craft and sell for profit to improve your crafting shop.FEATURES
  • Singleplayer
  • Charismatic main character
  • 46 Types of different weapons and armor to crafting
  • 159 Different types of items (keys, books, etc...)
  • 46 Recipes
  • 9 Villagers who will be helping you on your way
  • Weapon shop type of game
  • 10 Different types of monsters and enemies
  • 9 Different Battle scenarios
